idea:
Dear Sir / Madam

  Next Tech Solutions started by young and dynamic Techno commercial Kamlesh B. Patil in 2018, (NTS) is System Integrator firm situated at India’s financial capital having multiple branches in southern and western part of India.

  Next Tech Solutions (NTS) is an upcoming system integrator having experience and expertise , our team has more than 25 years Plus experience in different segment like Power Solutions, IT Industry , Surveillance segment, IoT , Network Security , Telecommunication Industry.

  We Next Tech Solutions (NTS) established longer and closer working relationships with our clients and supplier not only provide immediate and reliable services but to continually exceed expectations and goal.

WE Next Tech Solutions (NTS), are associated with Tata Teleservices, Exide, Uniline, APC, Canon & IDIS etc.

OUR LINE OF BUSINESS

 NETWORKING.

 COMPLETE POWER SOLUTIONS. (UPS, INVERTER, BATTERIES)
